entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:04 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
